ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT to_char(p.person_id) AS epm_co_code , p.full_name AS epm_co_name , 'SM' AS epm_co_type FROM CUX_REVIEW_GROUP_T g , CUX_GROUP_RANGE_T r , cux_jobs_v j , per_all_people_f p , per_all_assignments_f a WHERE g.group_name = '¸ß¹Ü' AND g.group_id = r.group_id AND r.job_id = j.job_id AND j.job_id = a.job_id AND a.person_id = p.person_id AND SYSDATE BETWEEN nvl(p.effective_start_date,SYSDATE) AND nvl(p.effective_end_date,SYSDATE) AND SYSDATE BETWEEN nvl(a.effective_start_date,SYSDATE) AND nvl(a.effective_end_date,SYSDATE) and :1 = 'SM' UNION ALL SELECT to_char(Organization_Id) AS epm_co_code , NAME AS epm_co_name , 'DEPT' AS epm_co_type FROM hr_all_organization_units haou WHERE haou.attribute3 = '¶þ²ã' and :1 in ('DEPARTMENT','POSITION')
